paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 gene variant N372H, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Caucasian women from Tyrol, Austria and Prague, Czech Republic, mean age 56±13 years

functional_data.summary: No significant association with breast cancer was found for the N372H variant.

variants.additional_notes: The study did not find a significant association between the N372H variant and breast cancer.
key_quotes: The association of the N372H polymorphism with breast cancer observed by Healey et al (2000) could not be confirmed in this study.

tables_processed.table_caption: Genotype frequencies of the eight SNPs investigated in the control and case groups from Tyrol and Prague
Genotype frequencies of the eight SNPs investigated in the control and case groups from Prague

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
